â“ FAQs:

ğŸ¤” What is Lemon Squeezy?
ğŸ‘‰ Is all-in-one platform for selling digital products, subscriptions, software licenses, and courses.

ğŸ¤” Who needs this extension?
ğŸ‘‰ All users who sell their digital products within lemonsqueezy.

ğŸ¤” How do lemonsqueezy payment fees work?
ğŸ‘‰ When you make a sale using Lemonsqueezy, they charge you a small fee ($0.50 + 5% of total), known as a â€œplatform fee,â€ to cover the costs of transaction fees.

ğŸ¤” What are processing fees?
ğŸ‘‰ There are certain times when an additional fee might be added to the platform fee to cover processing fees:

+1.5% for international (outside of the US) transactions
+1.5% for PayPal transactions
+0.5% for subscription payments

ğŸ¤” What is VAT?
ğŸ‘‰ Value Added Tax (VAT) is an indirect consumption tax levied on a product or service at each point of its production and distribution cycle, encompassing both tangible goods and digital products.

ğŸ¤” How do VAT rates work when selling my product?
ğŸ‘‰ If you sell digital products or services on lemonsqueezy, collecting and paying VAT on the sale of digital items in some countries is a necessity. You donâ€™t have to worry about collecting and remitting sales tax (including international tax like VAT) as lemonsqueezy simply takes care of it for you.

ğŸ¤” Does this extension work on any page?
ğŸ‘‰ Yes. You can open this extension on any page or site.

ğŸ¤” What browsers does it work on?
ğŸ‘‰ For now it is only available for Google Chrome browser, but soon I will launch in other browsers.

ğŸ¤” This extension is free?
